tests.text: You should give .sun a top of --fcc-expected--, but found --fcc-actual--.
You should give .sun a right of --fcc-expected--, but found --fcc-actual--.

description: Position the sun in the top right corner of the screen such that 75px of its top and right edges are off screen.
